sources.title: Amazon Jail, Curral De Mulheres 1982
sources.description: 1980's Women in Prison flick filmed in Brazil. The English subtitles help, but the story is pretty typical of the time. Lots of nudity, more violence than is necessary, forced prostitution, etc. The prison is run by a couple who are so inept it is a wonder anything gets done.  Portuguese with English Subtitles.
